00022 #ifndef HYPERTABLE_MAINTENANCEQUEUE_H
00023 #define HYPERTABLE_MAINTENANCEQUEUE_H

00025 #include <cassert>

00030 #include <boost/thread/condition.hpp>

00032 #include "Common/Error.h"

00036 #include "MaintenanceTask.h"
00037 
00038 namespace Hypertable {
00039 
00042   class MaintenanceQueue : public ReferenceCount {
00043 
00044     static bool             ms_pause;
00045     static boost::condition ms_cond;
00046 
00047     struct LtMaintenanceTask {
00048       bool operator()(const MaintenanceTask *sm1, const MaintenanceTask *sm2) const {
00049         return xtime_cmp(sm1->start_time, sm2->start_time) >= 0;
00050       }
00051     };
00052 
00053     typedef std::priority_queue<MaintenanceTask *, std::vector<MaintenanceTask *>, LtMaintenanceTask> TaskQueue;
00054 
00055     class MaintenanceQueueState {
00056     public:
00057       MaintenanceQueueState() : shutdown(false) { return; }
00058       TaskQueue          queue;
00059       boost::mutex       mutex;
00060       boost::condition   cond;
00061       bool               shutdown;
00062     };
00063 
00064     class Worker {
00065 
00066     public:
00067 
00068       Worker(MaintenanceQueueState &state) : m_state(state) { return; }
00069 
00070       void operator()() {
00071         boost::xtime now, next_work;
00072         MaintenanceTask *task = 0;
00073 
00074         while (true) {
00075 
00076           {
00077             boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_state.mutex);
00078 
00079             boost::xtime_get(&now, boost::TIME_UTC);
00080 
00081             while (m_state.queue.empty() || xtime_cmp((m_state.queue.top())->start_time, now) > 0) {
00082 
00083               if (m_state.shutdown)
00084                 return;
00085 
00086               if (m_state.queue.empty())
00087                 m_state.cond.wait(lock);
00088               else {
00089                 next_work = (m_state.queue.top())->start_time;
00090                 m_state.cond.timed_wait(lock, next_work);
00091               }
00092               boost::xtime_get(&now, boost::TIME_UTC);
00093             }
00094 
00095             task = m_state.queue.top();
00096             m_state.queue.pop();
00097           }
00098 
00099           try {
00100 
00101             // maybe pause
00102             {
00103               boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_state.mutex);
00104               while (ms_pause)
00105                 ms_cond.wait(lock);
00106             }
00107             
00108             task->execute();
00109           }
00110           catch(Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00111             HT_ERRORF("%s (%s)", Error::get_text(e.code()), e.what());
00112           }
00113 
00114           delete task;
00115         }
00116       }
00117 
00118     private:
00119       MaintenanceQueueState &m_state;
00120     };
00121 
00122     MaintenanceQueueState  m_state;
00123     boost::thread_group    m_threads;
00124     bool joined;
00125 
00126   public:
00127 
00134     MaintenanceQueue(int worker_count) : joined(false) {
00135       Worker Worker(m_state);
00136       assert (worker_count > 0);
00137       for (int i=0; i<worker_count; ++i)
00138         m_threads.create_thread(Worker);
00139       //threads
00140     }
00141 
00147     void shutdown() {
00148       m_state.shutdown = true;
00149       m_state.cond.notify_all();
00150     }
00151 
00156     void join() {
00157       if (!joined) {
00158         m_threads.join_all();
00159         joined = true;
00160       }
00161     }
00162 
00166     void stop() {
00167       ms_pause = true;
00168     }
00169 
00173     void start() {
00174       ms_pause = false;
00175       ms_cond.notify_all();
00176     }
00177 
00184     void add(MaintenanceTask *task) {
00185       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_state.mutex);
00186       m_state.queue.push(task);
00187       m_state.cond.notify_one();
00188     }
00189   };
00190   typedef boost::intrusive_ptr<MaintenanceQueue> MaintenanceQueuePtr;
00191 
00192 }
